member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteCacheMode
member.summary: Represents the connection-caching modes that can be used when creating a new . See SQLite.org for complete documentation on the differences between caching modes.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteCacheMode.Default
member.summary: Default mode.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteCacheMode.Private
member.summary: Private-cache mode. Each connection uses a private cache.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteCacheMode.Shared
member.summary: Shared-cache mode. Connections share a cache. This mode can change the behavior of transaction and table locking.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteCommand
member.summary: Represents a SQL statement to be executed against a SQLite database.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteConnection
member.summary: Represents a connection with a SQLite database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteConnection.Handle
member.summary: Represents an unmanaged pointer to a sqlite3 database object. See SQLite.org for more documentation on proper usage of this object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteConnection.ServerVersion
member.summary: Corresponds to the version of the SQLite library used by the connection.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteConnectionStringBuilder
member.summary: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteDataReader
member.summary: Provides methods for reading the result of a statement executed against a SQLite database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteDataReader.Handle
member.summary: Represents an unmanaged pointer to a sqlite3_stmt object. See SQLite.org for more documentation on proper usage of this object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteException.SqliteErrorCode
member.summary: The error code produced by SQLite. The value's meaning depends on the context in which the exception is thrown. See SQLite.org for a list of error codes.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteParameter
member.summary: Represents a parameter and its value in a SQL statement to be executed against a SQLite database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteParameter.SqliteType
member.summary: Represents the type affinity for this parameter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteParameter.ResetSqliteType
member.summary: Sets the parameter type to SqliteType.Text.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteParameterCollection
member.summary: A collection of .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteTransaction
member.summary: Represents a transaction made against a SQLite database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteTransaction.IsolationLevel
member.summary: Specifies the IsolationLevel for this transaction. This cannot be changed if the transaction is complete or closed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteTransaction.Commit
member.summary: Persists the results of all statements executed during this transaction.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteTransaction.Rollback
member.summary: Reverses all changes made in this transaction.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteType
member.summary: Represents the type affinities used by columns in SQLite tables. See SQLite.org for more details on type affinity
